results.description: In November 1983, two Dynamo Berlin footballers risked their lives as they fled to the West and left their whole lives behind in East Germany. This is their story.
results.shortTitle: The footballers who escaped from East Berlin
results.title: Dirk Schlegel and Falko Götz: The East Berlin footballers who fled from the Stasi

altText: An East German guard peers through a hole in the Berlin Wall
An East German guard peers through a whole in the Berlin Wall

results.description: Watch as Sebastian Polter scores a dramatic 87th minute penalty for Union Berlin, who beat inner city rivals Hertha Berlin in their first ever top flight derby.
results.shortTitle: Union Berlin score dramatic last-gasp penalty to beat rivals Hertha
results.title: Bundesliga: Union Berlin 1-0 Hertha Berlin - highlights

results.description: Football Focus visits Bundesliga side Union Berlin, a "rebellious" football club who are set to face Hertha Berlin for the first time ever in the top flight.
results.shortTitle: Union Berlin: 'A rebellious club in a rebellious city'
results.title: Union Berlin: The German fans who bled for their club

results.description: More than 30,000 Dynamo Dresden fans made the 125-mile journey to Hertha Berlin for a German Cup tie on Wednesday
results.title: Hertha Berlin v Dynamo Dresden: 30,000 away fans travel to German Cup tie

results.description: English defender Jonjoe Kenny scores his first goal as Schalke beat Hertha Berlin for a first Bundesliga win under David Wagner.
results.shortTitle: Kenny scores as Schalke get first win
results.title: Jonjoe Kenny scores as David Wagner's Schalke beat Hertha Berlin

results.description: Bayern Munich make a stuttering start in their attempt to win an eighth straight Bundesliga title after being held by battling Hertha Berlin.
results.shortTitle: Bayern Munich drop points in first game
results.title: Bayern Munich 2-2 Hertha Berlin: Robert Lewandowski rescues points with VAR penalty

results.description: Watford sell Dodi Lukebakio to Hertha Berlin for a reported £20m, despite the striker only playing a total of 15 minutes for the Hornets.
results.shortTitle: Watford sell Lukebakio to Hertha Berlin
results.title: Dodi Lukebakio: Watford sell striker to Hertha Berlin for reported £20m

results.description: West Ham face Athletic Bilbao, Crystal Palace host Hertha Berlin & Norwich City play Toulouse - Listen to BBC local radio commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: West Ham, Crystal Palace & Norwich in pre-season action
results.title: Listen to West Ham v Athletic Bilbao, Crystal Palace v Hertha Berlin & Norwich City v Toulouse in pre-season friendlies

results.description: Liverpool midfielder Marko Grujic completes a season-long loan move back to Bundesliga side Hertha Berlin.
results.title: Marko Grujic: Liverpool midfielder returns to Hertha Berlin on season-long loan

results.description: Marco Reus's stoppage-time strike helps Borussia Dortmund come from 2-1 down to defeat Hertha Berlin and take a three-point lead in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Hertha Berlin 2-3 Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Bayern Munich maintain their recent revival with victory over Hertha Berlin to take them level on points with Borussia Dortmund.
results.shortTitle: Bayern level on points with Dortmund
results.title: Bayern Munich 1-0 Hertha Berlin: Champions level on points with Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Kingsley Coman scores an extra-time winner as Bayern Munich progress to the German Cup quarter-finals with victory over Hertha Berlin.
results.title: Hertha Berlin 2-3 Bayern Munich

results.description: Stuttgart mourn the loss of captain Christian Gentner's father, who died in the stadium after Saturday's win over Hertha Berlin.
results.shortTitle: Stuttgart captain's dad dies in stadium
results.title: Stuttgart: Christian Gentner's father dies in stadium after Bundesliga game

results.description: England winger Jadon Sancho scores twice as unbeaten Bundesliga leaders Borussia Dortmund are held to a 2-2 draw by Hertha Berlin.
results.shortTitle: England's Sancho scores two as Dortmund stay top of Bundesliga
results.title: England winger Jadon Sancho scores twice as Borussia Dortmund stay top of Bundesliga

results.description: England winger Jadon Sancho scores twice but unbeaten Bundesliga leaders Borussia Dortmund are held by Hertha Berlin.
results.shortTitle: Sancho scores twice as Dortmund held
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-2 Hertha Berlin: Jadon Sancho scores as leaders held

results.description: Valentino Lazaro's start to the season since changing position for Hertha Berlin has seen him catch the eye.
results.title: Valentino Lazaro: 'The best Austrian since David Alaba'

results.description: Bundesliga champions and leaders Bayern Munich are beaten for the first time this season, losing 2-0 at Hertha Berlin.
results.shortTitle: Bayern's unbeaten start ended by Hertha
results.title: Hertha Berlin 2-0 Bayern Munich: Bayern's unbeaten start ends

results.description: Hertha Berlin host Bayern Munich in the German Bundesliga at the Olympiastadion - follow live text commentary.
results.title: Hertha Berlin v Bayern Munich live in the Bundesliga

results.description: Ademola Lookman finishes his RB Leipzig loan spell with his fifth Bundesliga goal in 11 games, but they miss out on a Champions League place.
results.shortTitle: Lookman scores in final RB Leipzig game
results.title: Ademola Lookman scores in final RB Leipzig game

results.description: Bayern Munich miss out on the chance for a club-record 15th victory in a row as they are held by Hertha Berlin.
results.title: Bayern Munich 0-0 Hertha Berlin
